Actions.Name: When a number opts out of receiving your bulk messages
Actions.Description: Triggered whenever a user opts out of receiving messages from your alphanumeric sender ID

Actions.Name: When you receive a Delivery Report for a sent message
Actions.Description: Triggered when you receive a Delivery Report for a message initially sent

Actions.Name: When you receive a message in your inbox
Actions.Description: Triggered whenever a message is sent to any of your registered shortcodes

Actions.Name: Send SMS
Actions.Description: Send an SMS to multiple numbers.
